Description: The following statement contains a magic number: nativeBody.Instructions.Add(new X86Instruction              {                  Mnemonic = X86Mnemonic.Mov'                  OpCode = X86OpCodes.Mov_Eax_Imm1632'                  Operand1 = new X86Operand(X86Register.Eax)'                  Operand2 = new X86Operand(1337)'              });
